LanguageData.PsychicEmanator.label: psychic emanator
LanguageData.PsychicEmanator.description: An ancient device that projects a soothing psychic field around itself. This improves the mood of anyone nearby. Works through walls.
LanguageData.PsychicEmanator_Blueprint_Install.label: psychic emanator (blueprint)
LanguageData.VanometricPowerCell.label: vanometric power cell
LanguageData.VanometricPowerCell.description: Generates free energy, forever, without using fuel. This technology is developed by archotech AIs, and is beyond even most glitterworld societies. While nobody knows exactly how it works, scholars believe it somehow extracts energy directly from fluctuations in the quantum foam.
LanguageData.InfiniteChemreactor.label: infinite chemreactor
LanguageData.InfiniteChemreactor.description: Slowly generates chemfuel by a complex series of chemical reactions, using atoms extracted from the air.
